results.content: It is a vast subject and the course is quite comprehensive. The explanations of the many obscure workings of D3 tools could be better. Everything is methodically presented, but sometimes you need to mute the explanation and take a minute to understand it yourself, since the explanation sort of repeats what you see in the code. But it is exhaustive and methodical and you do learn a lot. It just sort of adds up as you go. It is a very long course and a lot of time is spent typing in CSS. This is not part of what you're here to learn and really, why can't we download those files if they are already there. That's a bit silly. I'm not sure how other people follow this course. I went trough every lesson methodically, but I didn't see any questions or comments from other students in any of the lessons (the ones you normally see in Udemy at the bottom of the page. Good course to learn about D3.js if you have the time. One last warning: it takes a long while to get into actual charts. A lot of DOM manipulation at first, which is good but may not be your expectation. Thanks and good luck.

But it is exhaustive and methodical and you do learn a lot. It just sort of adds up as you go. It is a very long course and a lot of time is spent typing in CSS. This is not part of what you're here to learn and really, why can't we download those files if they are already there. That's a bit silly. I'm not sure how other people follow this course. A lot of DOM manipulation at first, which is good but may not be your expectation. Thanks and good luck.

results.content: This course is really for D3js newbies! I could follow codes easily and understand what's going on! Highly recommend this great coruse :p!

response.content: Artemismars! Thank you for the rating/review. Yes indeed, the primary goal of this course is to help understand D3 behind the scenes. This library has a steep learning curve and I wanted to make the learning process easy and enjoyable for new comers :) Hope your 'Highly recommend' part helps many others opt this long, detailed and projects filled course :)
